dares.name: Girl look at that body

dares.name: I hope you're a medium too...
Marco Polo
dares.description: Blindfold this person and spin them until they're dizzy. They need to catch and kiss someone in the room!

dares.name: DON'T TOUCH ME I'M STERILE

dares.description: Kiss the next person to walk into the party on the lips!

dares.name: Ice Ice Baby
dares.description: Put an icecube down your shirt until it melts!

dares.name: Mmm, cotton

dares.name: Ouch
